description: DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) – Project No. - SLSO2396_SC81507 – Janitorial Services, CFB Shilo, Manitoba.\\nThe work includes, but is not necessarily limited to, the supply of labour, material, supervision, and equipment necessary to perform janitorial cleaning services and specified related work for various buildings at CFB Shilo, MB.\\n\\nThe estimated cost for this opportunity is in the order of $3,250,000 (including PCAs and Mobilization) for the initial two-year period. If mutually agreed, the contract may be extended for up to three (3) additional one (1) year periods under the same terms and conditions. The total estimated cost for this opportunity is in the order of $8,350,000 (including PCAs) if fully executed.\\nThe Contract will be in place from the Notification of Award to March 31, 2026. Following the Contract award, the contractor will be required to progressively mobilize (mobilization) and be ready to commence providing services on April 1, 2024, referred to as the Service Commencement date.\\n\\n

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** Janitorial Services, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo, Manitoba.
**Solicitation Number:** SLSO2396_SC81507
**Reference Number:** MX-42986143460

**Government Agency:** Defence Construction Canada, Western Region.
**Contact Information:** Brad Jeaurond (bradley.jeaurond@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 204-765-3000 x4094)

**Notice Type:** Compulsory Bid Solicitation
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Project Description:** Defence Construction Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for janitorial services at CFB Shilo, Manitoba. The contract involves the supply of labour, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary to perform janitorial cleaning services and related work in various buildings at the base.

**Estimated Contract Price:** $3,250,000 for the initial two-year period, with a total estimated cost of $8,350,000 if fully executed over a period of five years.

**Contract Duration:** The contract will be in place from the date of notification of award to March 31, 2026, with the option to extend for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.

**Bid Submission:** Bidding documents are available on MERX (www.merx.com). Bidders must register on the MERX website to access the documents and submit their bids.

**Site Visit:** A non-mandatory site visit has been arranged for January 10, 2024, at 10:00 a.m. at Building P-101, CFB Shilo, Manitoba. It is highly recommended that bidders attend this visit.

**Security Requirements:** The successful contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP).

**Conditions of Contract:** The contract will be governed by the Canadian Federal Government's standard contract terms and conditions. The selected contractor will be required to comply with all applicable laws and regulations related to government contracts.

**Eligibility:** Only contractors who have registered with the Canadian Federal Government's supplier registration system and have a valid business registration number will be eligible to bid on this project.
